remarks: A method for computing restricted iota.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.)
statement:
riota5.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
riota5.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps <-> x = B ) ) $.
riota5 $p |- ( ph -> ( iota_ x e. A ps ) = B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
